name: Power Trip
description:
Play are Lottie, a small shiny character that has been tasked to help save the village from darkness following a harrowing power outage! Use your lotus light to guide yourself into the darkness, and light all of the streetlamps before it's too late!

How to play:

-  WASD keys to move

- Space key to jump

- Turn the camera with your mouse

- X key to turn on Lotus Light

- Click the mouse near a streetlamp to turn it on/off

Can you turn on all of them in time?

***

[My end of module project for university. Hope to update and improve on it in the future! 

Everything is my work and made by me. Only thing is that I did also go to textures.com for some general textures, but added to them myself after to help my understanding of textures, shaders, etc. A fun time overall!

]
